body_html: I also followed the example in CS224D until I hit a wall when trying to do mini-batching. My graph and dataset are both so large that rebuilding the graph for each tree and running them one at a time is just not feasible. I also thought about using a while_loop, but I don't see how this can work since the incoming trees have different sizes, as @ibab mentioned.

body: I also followed the example in CS224D until I hit a wall when trying to do mini-batching. My graph and dataset are both so large that rebuilding the graph for each tree and running them one at a time is just not feasible. I also thought about using a while_loop, but I don't see how this can work since the incoming trees have different sizes, as @ibab mentioned.
